content: If it's an IMAP account, sent messages are automatically copied to Sent Mail, so that is the folder that should be subscribed.

content: Click 'folder mode' and click 'tags' to add to left sidebar with totals - or click view>folders Tags from menu bar. Press alt key if menu bar not shown.
